#summary How to use the Forms Framework

= Ref-Template =

== frw_ref.fmb ==

This is the central form of the Forms-Framework. All objects of the form-templates, form-modules and all menus are inherited from here.

The objects are bundles in object-groups. Those groups are inherited to the forms-template and from there they're copied into each form-module
